      • ControllerAdvertiser

        public ControllerAdvertiser(java.lang.String multicast_address,
                            int broadcast_port,
                            int reply_port)
        Create a controller advertiser that also tells the device what port to send reply to
        Parameters:
        multicast_address - the multicast address we will use
        broadcast_port - The port we will send to
        reply_port - The port we want the device to respond to

      • isOnlyMulticastMessages

        public boolean isOnlyMulticastMessages()
        Are we only doing Multicast message
        Returns:
        true if we are only doing multicast and are not doing broadcast

      • setOnlyMulticastMessages

        public void setOnlyMulticastMessages(boolean onlyMulticastMessages)
        Set if we are going to only allow multicast ot set to false if we will also put broadcast messages
        Parameters:
        onlyMulticastMessages - true if we are only going to allow multicast messages. Fals if we will also do broadcast messages
